snippet: Despite a downbeat report on home construction, the three major stock markets managed to post increases ahead of the Federal Reserve meeting on Wednesday.
abstract: Stocks rebound from downbeat start, building on small gains for third consecutive day.
lead_paragraph: Despite a downbeat report on home construction, the three major stock markets managed to post increases ahead of the Federal Reserve meeting on Wednesday.

headline.main: A Day of Modest Advances Ahead of the Fed’s Updates
headline.print_headline: A Day of Modest Advances Ahead of the Fed’s Updates
